name: Colorlift
description:
Colorlift was made in 3 hours for the Tryjam #170.

Colorlift is a game about a house full of people. Sadly the people are not in their own apartments, so your job is to bring them there. Using the lift in the middle of the house, you can move them to their apartments. The less people you have to move, the better.

Pro Tip for advanced players only:

Try clicking/tapping on the windows.
